title: Miley Cyrus Gets Engaged to Maxx Morando
summary: Miley Cyrus, a famous singer, has said yes to marrying her boyfriend Maxx Morando. They have been together for four years. Miley showed a beautiful gold and diamond ring at a movie event in Los Angeles. She told a TV show that Maxx surprised her by asking her to marry him during a trip to Asia. Miley was married before to Liam Hemsworth, but they divorced. Maxx is a drummer in a band called Liily. Miley is happy and says Maxx helps her grow. She also has a new song in a movie but does not want to go on tour right now.
